SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am01
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am01.controller

Class VirtualView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am01.controller.VirtualView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class VirtualView extends Object implements Runnable
This class handles NetworkMessage between client and server:
  • send message to the client when events are emitted;
  • receive client message and manage them by calling Controller, PlayerManager and GameManager classes.
    • To each player is associated an instance of this class. This class is Runnable and it is executed by a different thread.
    See Also:
    • NetworkMessage
    • Controller
    • PlayerManager

    • Constructor Details

      • VirtualView

        public VirtualView(Controller controller, Connection<S2CNetworkMessage,C2SNetworkMessage> connection, GameManager gameManager, PlayerManager playerManager)
        Constructs a new instance of VirtualView with the given parameters. It also makes this object listen to GameManager events.
        Parameters:
        controller - the controller classes that permit to modify the model
        connection - the connection between client and server
        gameManager - the game handler
        playerManager - the player handler

      • handleMessage

        public void handleMessage(AuthenticateC2S message) throws IllegalMoveException, NetworkException
        This method manages AuthenticateC2S message
        Parameters:
        message - the message sent by the client
        Throws:
        IllegalMoveException - if message is sent during wrong GameStatus
        NetworkException - if there are connection problems
